net.trajano.doxdb.rest

Class DoxResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.doxdb.rest.DoxResource

  • @Path(value="")
@RequestScoped
public class DoxResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This provides the REST API for DoxDB. The API is built to support AngularJS $resource natively.

    • Field Detail

      • NO_CACHE

        private static final javax.ws.rs.core.CacheControl NO_CACHE
        Cache control when the data should not be cached.

      • OK_CACHE

        private static final javax.ws.rs.core.CacheControl OK_CACHE
        Cache control when the data can be cached. However, it should still not be persisted on disk

      • RESPONSE_TYPE

        private static final java.lang.String RESPONSE_TYPE
        application/json with the the UTF-8 character set. Needs to be a constant string in order to be used in annotations.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getSchema

        @GET
@Path(value="schema/{segments: .*}")
@Produces(value="application/json; charset=utf-8")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSchema(@PathParam(value="segments")
                                                    java.util.List<javax.ws.rs.core.PathSegment> segments)
        Returns the schema document. It does a check to make sure each path segment contains a restricted set of characters.
        Parameters:
        segments - path segments after the URL
        Returns:
        the schema document.
